Jekyll Themes

Pixyll

Author: John Otander
License: MIT License
Homepage Download Demo

Pixyll is a simple, beautiful theme for Jekyll that emphasizes content rather than aesthetic fluff. Pixyll is mobile first, fluidly responsive, and delightfully lightweight.

Itâ€™s pretty minimal, but leverages large type and drastic contrast to make a statement, on all devices.

Crafted with <3 by John Otander (@4lpine).

Want to Submit a Theme?

  • Fork the site on GitHub
  • Create a new post in the _posts directory and fill out the relevant YAML fields
  • Make a 250x200 thumbnail and drop it in the thumbnails directory. List its filename in the post's markdown file.
  • Test it out, then push your changes up and open a pull request.
